list.name: Changes
list.comment:
ci: add GitLab CI configuration with test, build, and deploy stages
Signed-off-by: BULGHERONI Antonio <antonio.bulgheroni@ec.europa.eu>

task.summary:
feat: add core tools package with file, plotting, and generic utilities
This commit establishes the initial structure and implementation of the mafw_tools package, including:
- Core package structure with __init__.py - File tools module with pickle serialization/deserialization and filename generation - Plotting tools module with image plotting capabilities - Generic tools module with nested attribute retrieval - Package configuration via pyproject.toml - License file and version information - README with installation and usage instructions
The package provides foundational utilities for data analysis workflows, with support for file I/O operations, plotting functionality, and generic helper functions.
Signed-off-by: BULGHERONI Antonio <antonio.bulgheroni@ec.europa.eu>

test: add comprehensive unit tests for plotting, generic, and file tools modules
Signed-off-by: BULGHERONI Antonio <antonio.bulgheroni@ec.europa.eu>

feat(pyproject.toml): update package name and add test environment configuration
- Rename package from "mafw_tools" to "mafw-tools" - Add test optional dependency group with pytest and mafw_tools[dev] - Configure hatch test environments with pytest-integration - Setup test matrix for Python versions 3.11, 3.12, 3.13 - Add coverage configuration for test runs
Signed-off-by: BULGHERONI Antonio <antonio.bulgheroni@ec.europa.eu>

feat: add pre-commit configuration with ruff, pre-commit-hooks, and validate-pyproject
Add .pre-commit-config.yaml to enforce code quality checks including: - Ruff for linting and formatting - Pre-commit hooks for TOML validation - PyProject validation
Signed-off-by: BULGHERONI Antonio <antonio.bulgheroni@ec.europa.eu>

style: ruff lint and check
Signed-off-by: BULGHERONI Antonio <antonio.bulgheroni@ec.europa.eu>

ci: add GitLab CI configuration with test, build, and deploy stages
Signed-off-by: BULGHERONI Antonio <antonio.bulgheroni@ec.europa.eu>
